content.p: I have some odds and ends I'm hosting on the site, specifically web programs I want to use.
I made a simple spreadsheet program to do my taxes because I stopped using office and the other offerings are too slow!
I made numerous errors on my taxes due to improperly calculating my tax deductions, but the software itself works just fine!
You can "compile" some WASM in your browser on this page. You'll see what I mean if you click.
I put a copy of the retro-b5500 emulator on my site!
I decided to host it because I'm learning some ALGOL in my free time and figured an authentic ALGOL system is the best place to start. Eventually I might even publish the project I'm working on!
